meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unfit.
meanings.sent1: Her unfitness for the job was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised against strenuous exercise due to his unfitness.
meanings.sent3: His unfitness for the dance class was clear when he tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The unfitness of the old bridge became apparent when it collapsed under the weight of the truck.
meanings.sent5: The unfitness of the worn-out shoes was highlighted by the blisters they caused.

meanings.definition: Lack of physical or mental ability or capacity.
meanings.sent1: The unfitness of the student to complete the advanced math problems was concerning.
meanings.sent2: Her unfitness for the marathon was evident when she struggled to run a mile.
meanings.sent3: The unfitness of the cat to catch the mouse was comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The unfitness of the old computer to handle modern software was frustrating for the user.
meanings.sent5: The unfitness of the rusty lock to secure the door was a security risk.
